articles.title: IND vs PAK, latest weather updates: Rain forecast in Colombo for India v Pakistan Asia Cup 2023 Super Fours match - Wisden
articles.description: The upcoming India-Pakistan clash in the 2023 Asia Cup could be hampered by rain - here’s the latest weather update of the IND vs PAK.
articles.content:
India’s Super Four match against Pakistan on September 10 could well be affected by rain. Here is the latest weather update of the IND vs PAK ODI and the latest rain forecast.

articles.title: Asian Games: Kalyan Chaubey to request FSDL to defer ISL by 10 days - Khel Now
articles.description: AIFF President Kalyan Chaubey has decided to request the FSDL to postpone the Indian Super League (ISL) by 10 days for the upcoming Asian Games.
articles.content: As per a report from The Times of India, AIFF President Kalyan Chaubey is all set to speak to FSDL and request a postponement of the Indian Super League. The All India Football Federation (AIFF) has … [+3319 chars]
